global.title: TPD Submission Tools
global.description:
TPD Submission Tool is a implementation of The Tobacco Products Directive.
This is facility tools allowing to import submitter, tobacco and e-cigarette information.

info.authenticatedInfo:
you can try the default accounts:
- Administrator (login="admin" and password="admin")
- User (login="user" and password="user").
info.register: You don't have an account yet? Register a new account

error.dontmatch: The password and its confirmation do not match!

username.minlength: The user name is required to be at least 3 characters
username.maxlength: The user name cannot be longer than 20 characters
username.pattern: The user name can only contain letters and digits

newpassword.minlength: The password is required to be at least 5 characters
newpassword.maxlength: The password cannot be longer than 50 characters

password.minlength: The password is required to be at least 5 characters
password.maxlength: The password cannot be longer than 50 characters

confirmpassword.minlength: The confirmation password is required to be at least 5 characters
confirmpassword.maxlength: The confirmation password cannot be longer than 50 characters
confirmpassword.compareTo: The password confirmation must match the previous password

confirmnewpassword.required: The confirmation new password is required.
confirmnewpassword.minlength: The confirmation new password is required to be at least 5 characters
confirmnewpassword.maxlength: The confirmation new password cannot be longer than 50 characters
confirmnewpassword.compareTo: The password confirmation must match the new password

email.minlength: The e-mail address is required to be at least 5 characters
email.maxlength: The e-mail address cannot be longer than 50 characters
